Jackson Eshbaugh

Computational Linguistics • ML Interpretability • Multilingual NLP

I study computer science and French at Lafayette College, focusing on how artificial systems understand language—and how we can make those systems more transparent, inclusive, and useful across disciplines.

Interpreting models, embracing language, bridging disciplines.

Jackson Eshbaugh is a computer science and French student at Lafayette College. His research explores machine learning interpretability and multilingual NLP, with a focus on understanding language through computational methods.
